text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In dem Brandmüllerischen Buchladen wird ein <BIBL><TITLE>Project</TITLE> von <AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR>, klugen und verständigen Hauß-Patter, wie auch avelichem Land-Leben, welches durch Subscriptionen in <VOLUME>2. Folianten</VOLUME> <PRIZE>6. fl.</PRIZE> gedrucket wird</BIBL>. Ferner ist allda neulich fertig worden: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Bibel</TITLE> mit Figuren in <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL>; Item, des Herrn Abbts <BIBL><AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem frantzösischen ubersetzt</BIBL>; Item, <BIBL><TITLE>die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem Englischen ubersetzt</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":5,"explanation":"1. The first <BIBL> tag was not properly closed before the next sentence; the text after <AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR> was outside of any tag and the <TITLE> tag was not closed. I moved the text into the <BIBL> and closed the tags properly. 2. The second book advert (Lutheri Bibel) was missing a <BIBL> tag; I wrapped it in <BIBL>. 3. The third book (Fleury Kirchen-Historien) was not wrapped in <BIBL>; I added the <BIBL> tags. 4. The fourth book (die gantze Pflicht des Menschen) was already in <BIBL> but was missing a closing period; I left it as is. 5. I corrected some malformed or misplaced commas and punctuation, and fixed some Unicode issues for better readability."}
